name: Micallef - Connecticut - Londres
additionalNotes: Micallef cigars was founded in 2016 when Al Micallef, a successful entrepreneur, met Joel and Edel Gomez Sanchez, a Cuban family with a long history in the cigar industry that spans more than 75 years. Intrigued by the cigar business, Micallef worked with the Sanchez family to develop a premium cigar that suited his tastes. His cigars soon received favorable recognition by cigar aficionados. Micallef cigars are known for their fine tobacco and special fermentation process that ensures their full-bodied flavor.
